legacy.full_text:
It costs about $130,000 per hour to keep astronauts in orbit. Is organizing cargo worth that price tag? 

Caltech dropout Ethan Barajas launched Icarus Robotics to automate the grunt work with AI-powered robots. The goal: Let highly trained humans focus on discovery. Read more: https://t.co/0QhS88xc8v
